channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Awful road condition outside 187/185 Gloucester Road, 20th November
item.description:
The road which stretches outside 185/187 where the bus stop is situated has several potholes in succession combined with awful road surface conditions. Vehicles travelling over this cause house tremors. It is appallling and has been for years and desperately needs resurfacing to prevent damage to houses and vehicles.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 185, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Surface water, 19th November
item.description:
Surface water does not drain away. Cars splash pedestrians when two cars have to pass each other. It has been this way for a long time making the path difficult to use.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1a, Westdown Gardens, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 way temporary lights -, 19th November
item.description:
The 3 way temporary lights on Innsworth Lane outside Rookery Road / new houses have been going on for months. The lights were due to be removed a week ago and are still there. Please finish the work as the traffic queues are horrendous. The lights on Rookery Road need to be 20 seconds max as hardly any traffic coming out. Please finish the work and give us motorists our usual timings without any delays. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innsworth Lane, Innsworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing junction on signage, 19th November
item.description:
Hi, could you take a look at the signage around the roundabout as I believe that one of the exits is not shown/listed. example coming from Churchdown by fire station, and you are going towards Hucclecote eg heading to tenpin road, the roundabout says exit 2, but due to Elmbridge court business park the road heading to tenpin is exit 3. Whilst not a major exit, it is confusing as a driving instructor to say to pupils where we get them to look at the signage that it is exit 3 not 2. Hope that makes sense but happy to chat over if not clear
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 19th November
item.description:
Customer reports that there have been barriers & cones in place on a section of c/way since September. No sign of any work that needs to be done, and are currently narrowing the road on the junction - asking if these can be removed if they're not needed.
